answers.answer: It could be just the trip. I am 18weeks as well and am having nose bleeds but it is normally around when I am puking so probably from the pressure. I feel faint as well but it's from dehydration that I am struggling with. If it gets really bad I would see a Dr though cause if sugar is effecting it it could be diabetes or something like that. Goodluck
Thank you and poweraids helps with dehydration

Yeah I try the Gatorade isn't helping me too much I have severe "morning sickness" even going to the hospital a couple times a week for ivs hardly helps its horrible but this is my third pregnancy and they were all like this I just hope this one doesn't last until I give birth like the other to. At least when I get thru this one I am done my family so don't have to go thru it again. Hope you have a fun trip
Thank you and it has been a fun trip. even have a sunburn to prove it

question: Ok I'm 18w and for the past 2 days i have been on a costal trip. i have had 3 massive bloody noses and everytime i consume sugar chocolate, koolaid, or even starches which are slow acting sugars i get faint i can't walk and its followed by bloody nose or vomiting.... is this a serious thing or could it be the resent location change????
title: help.
